articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Inspects Stock-breeding Base in Sepho Area
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Inspects Stock-breeding Base in Sepho Area
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and premier of the DPRK Cabinet, made a field survey of the stock-breeding base in Sepho area to learn about its operation.
					 Going round Aeguk Cow Farm, Sheep Farm, Diary Cattle Farm and Meat Processing Plant of the base, Pak encouraged its officials and workers in their devoted efforts to supply people with more meat and dairy processed goods.
					
					 Studying the construction of Sepho Army-People Power Plant and Phyonggang Army-People Power Plant, the premier called on the members and officers of the shock brigade to further raise the flame of creating the Mallima speed in the project construction as befitting the creators of Kangwondo spirit.
					
					 A consultative meeting in the field discussed measures for more substantially operating the stock-breeding base in Sepho area and further stepping up the construction of the power plants.

articles.title: DPRK Will Do Its Best for Unity of G77: Head of DPRK Delegation
articles.content:
DPRK Will Do Its Best for Unity of G77: Head of DPRK Delegation
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho, head of the DPRK delegation, made an address at the  ministerial meeting of the G77 held in the UN Headquarters on Sept. 22.
					 The "Post 2015 Development Agenda", adopted at the Summit Conference in 2015 marking the 70th anniversary of the UN, is an action program of mankind that pledges to wipe out social inequality and poverty on a global scale and build a world that ensures affluent life for not only our generation but the coming generations as well, he said, adding:
					
					 The Democratic People's Republic of Korea considers the goals set forth in the Post 2015 Development Agenda to be in line with its policy for the construction of a thriving socialist nation and is actively involved in the global efforts towards achieving them.
					
					 For the DPRK which set the building of a socialist power, the ideal and dream of its people, as the ultimate goal, a peaceful environment is crucial.
					
					 Unfortunately in the international arena, a certain country which seeks to retain its declining position as a "superpower" at any cost is continuously taking illegal and inhumane actions to obliterate not only the right to development of a sovereign state but also its right to existence. 
					
					 Not satisfied with threatening the DPRK with military force, the U.S. tries to impose economic blockade on it to stifle its overall economy, calling for "stronger international action".
					
					 The U.S. is begging and forcing other countries to implement the "sanctions resolutions" adopted by the UNSC against the DPRK. Then, the bottom line is, where does the legal basis for these "resolutions" lie?
					
					 UN member states should, as a matter of course, thoroughly assess the lawfulness of these resolutions before getting down to implementing the "sanction resolutions".
					
					 The "sanctions resolutions" cooked up by the U.S. with the help of UNSC are an epitome of double standard and a product of the anti-DPRK hostile policy of the U.S. and its strategy for world dominance which aim at dominating the entire Korean peninsula and realizing world dominance.
					
					 The DPRK's reason for never recognizing the UNSC's "sanctions resolutions" and rejecting them as illegal documents is founded on this legal basis of international laws.
					
					  As long as the U.S. persists in arbitrariness and high-handedness, interference in others' internal affairs and acts of aggression, scorning and antagonizing other countries' political systems with unilateral standards and notions, the goals set forth in the Post 2015 Development Agenda for the welfare of mankind can never be attained.
					
					 The DPRK government will continue to fulfill its duty towards ensuring the unity of G77 to establish a new international economic order based on justice, equality and fairness by strengthening solidarity with all countries that advocate independence under the banner of independence against imperialism.

articles.title: G77 Ministers Meet to Reject Unilateral Sanctions on DPRK
articles.content:
G77 Ministers Meet to Reject Unilateral Sanctions on DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- A G77 ministerial meeting took place at the headquarters of the UN on Sept. 22.
					 Attending it were foreign ministers and representatives of G77 member nations.
					
					 Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho who is leading the DPRK delegation addressed the meeting.
					
					 The meeting adopted a declaration rejecting the unilateral sanctions on the DPRK, which reflects the unanimous and principled stand of the member states.
					
					 The declaration reaffirmed the rejection to the unilateral economic sanctions on the DPRK, which have a negative impact on its development and prosperity, and demanded an immediate lifting of those sanctions in this regard.

articles.title: WPK Central Committee Greets Congress of Mozambique Liberation Front Party
articles.content:
WPK Central Committee Greets Congress of Mozambique Liberation Front Party
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to the 11th Congress of the Mozambique Liberation Front Party.
					 The message noted that over the past 50-odd years after its foundation the Mozambique Liberation Front Party achieved the independence of the country through an arduous armed struggle and has registered great successes in the work to defend the sovereignty of the nation and achieve the political stability and socio-economic progress of the country.
					
					 It expressed belief that the Congress would serve as an important occasion in further consolidating the successes made in the struggle for independent development and prosperity of the country and strengthening the Party.
					
					 It wished great success in the Congress, hoping that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties forged in the common struggle for independence against imperialism would continue to develop on good terms in the interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Workers Will Deal Sledge-Hammer Blow at War Maniacs: C.C., GFTUK
articles.content:
Workers Will Deal Sledge-Hammer Blow at War Maniacs: C.C., GFTUK
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) in a statement Tuesday said the historic statement made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un to deal a stern sledge-hammer blow at the U.S. imperialist aggressors is a declaration of Juche Korea which clearly represented the strong spirit and retaliatory will of all the people including the workers.
					 The U.S. war maniacs like Trump made the open declaration of war, much upset and seized by extreme frustration in the face of the dazzling achievements made by the DPRK in its efforts to reach the final destination in rounding off the state nuclear force, but the declaration is nothing but a last ditch effort of those facing the ruin, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 For the sake of independent life of the workers all over the world, such unpopular society like the U.S. which is getting corpulent at the cost of blood shed by the billions of peoples has to disappear from the earth and such popular country as the DPRK has to prosper for eternity.
					
					 The workers of the DPRK are full of enthusiasm to supply more Korean-style strategic weapons and ultra-modern war hardware to fronts at a faster speed which are waiting for the order for the final showdown with the U.S. and the order for the grand advance for Korea's reunification so that Trump and his group might not bluff any more.
					
					 We will wage increased production drive, creation drive and general charge drive through the great surge of self-reliance to settle accounts with the U.S. imperialists, and demonstrate the stamina of the Korean working class once again to the war maniacs hell bent on anti-DPRK sanctions and pressure.
					
					 We, the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class, will turn out in the do-or-die battle with the U.S. in hearty response to the call of the respected Supreme Leader and force with the dignity and honor of Juche Korea the old deranged man to pay a dear price and bring about the final victory without fail.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Will Mete out Merciless Punishment to Provocateurs: C.C., UAWK
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Will Mete out Merciless Punishment to Provocateurs: C.C., UAWK
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) Tuesday in a statement fully supported the historic statement issued by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un to make the man holding the prerogative of supreme command of the U.S. pay dearly for his rude nonsense calling for totally destroying the DPRK. 
					 Noting that the reckless remarks of the old lunatic Trump to "totally destroy" the DPRK and the whole Korean nation are the thrice-cursed provocative crime, the statement went on:
					
					 Trump is a worm less than animals raised by farmers and a poisonous mushroom less than weed in paddy and non-paddy fields.
					
					 All the cooperative fields from Taehongdan Plain in the northern area to Yonbaek Plain adjacent to the demarcation line are seething with surging resentment. 
					
					 The Yankees are going hysterical, frightened by the thunder of Juche bomb declaring the last end of the U.S. imperialism. Our agricultural workers regard them as puppets only in paddy and non-paddy fields.
					
					 The sworn enemies should clearly understand the stamina and disposition of our farmers who have grown stronger in the tempest of the Juche revolution under the leadership of the great Party.
					
					 We all the members of the UAWK and agricultural workers will mete out the most merciless punishment to the disgusting provokers just as the peasant heroes in the former generation who displayed bravery with arms and defeated the U.S. imperialists by ensuring wartime food production even under the enemies' bombing during the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: More Mass Rallies Held
articles.content:
More Mass Rallies Held
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies took place in North Phyongan, North Hwanghae and Kangwon provinces on Monday to win the final victory through all-out charge in the showdown with the U.S.
					 They were attended by officials of local party, power and economic organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities, working people and youth and students.
					
					 The statement of Chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea Kim Jong Un was read out at the rallies before speeches.
					
					 The speakers said that the statement is a volcano-like eruption of the faith and will of the Korean army and people to turn out in the anti-U.S. struggle for bringing to the final doom the U.S. imperialists, sworn enemy of the Korean nation, and have the pent-up wrath settled and thus clearly show the mettle of heroic Korea.
					
					 They charged the frantic call of Trump, old boss of gangsters, for totally destroying the DPRK is ferocious outbursts that could be made only by the American Yankees, modern type of cannibals and villains who make desperate efforts to remove the DPRK, fortress of socialism, at any cost, regarding it as a thorn in the flesh.
					
					 They stressed that the Korean people would surely settle the showdown with the sworn enemy U.S. imperialists, taking the toughest counteraction ever in history since they made the most ferocious declaration of war against the inviolable and dignified DPRK.
					
					 No matter whatever formidable enemies come in attack, the final victory is in store for the DPRK and no force on the earth can check its advance as long as there is the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un. This is the immutable truth enshrined in the hearts of all our people, the speakers said. 
					
					 There took place mass demonstrations.
					
					 The demonstrators marched through squares and streets in array, raising shouts for annihilating the enemies.

articles.title: U.S. Imperialists Are Bound to Perish: DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
U.S. Imperialists Are Bound to Perish: DPRK Citizens
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The anti-Trump, anti-U.S. retaliatory spirit grows stronger among the DPRK people, as the time goes by.
					 Leading dailies of the country including Rodong Sinmun and Minju Joson carry articles reflecting the will of the DPRK people, enraged at the U.S. chief executive's reckless remarks of wiping out the DPRK of 25 million people off the map on the UN arena, to exterminate the U.S. imperialists at any cost.
					
					 The statement made by the chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and songs like "Peace Is Guaranteed by Our Arms" are blared from loudspeaker cars everyday. On display at all industrial establishments, farms and construction sites are posters and slogans calling for boosting production and speeding up construction with the invincible faith, keeping highly alert.
					
					 Literally, the whole country is permeated with the spirit to annihilate war maniac and old lunatic Trump on the earth.
					
					 Mun Hak Chol, chief engineer at the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, told KCNA:
					
					 Trump, a head of hooligans, will keenly feel how dearly he should pay for his reckless remarks.
					
					 Employees of the complex are increasing the power production with the will to throw the old lunatic at the White House and all his ragtag stooges into a boiler.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are doomed to a moth attracted to fire.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Algerian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Algerian President
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greetings from Algerian President Abdelaziz Bouteflika on September 13.
					 In the message the president extended the warmest congratulations on behalf of the Algerian people and government and on his own behalf to Kim Jong Un on the national holiday of the DPRK and heartily wished him happiness in good health and the friendly Korean people greater progress and prosperity.
					
					 The message praised the long-standing ties of friendship and solidarity between the two countries and affirmed the will to strive for the strengthening of the ties in the interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Tajikistan
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Tajikistan
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Emomali Rahmon, president of Tajikistan, on September 5.
					 In the message the president extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the national holiday of the DPRK.
					
					 He wished success in good health to Kim Jong Un and peace, prosperity and well-being to the friendly Korean people.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of Koreans in Japan visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Tuesday.
					 They laid bunches of flowers at the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: New World Records Set in Quick Reading Contest
articles.content:
New World Records Set in Quick Reading Contest
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Pang Un Sim, a twenty year-old student at Kim Hyong Jik University of Education in the DPRK, set new world records in three memory events of the quick reading (brain power) contest of students in the field of teacher training recently took place in the DPRK.
					 When interviewed by KCNA, Cha Yong Ho, section chief of the university, said:
					
					 Pang memorized 20 more words than the existing world record in the event of 15-minute casual words memory, 320 words in total, according to a judgment based on the IMS amended by the WMSC in February 2016.
					
					 She also set new world records by memorizing 4,840 binary numbers for 30 minutes and 33 packs of cards for 60 minutes to break the previous world records of 4,673 numbers and 31 packs.
					
					 She got 7,575 points in total at ten memory events, surpassing the Millennium Standards (6,000 points) of the IGM (International Grand Master).
					
					 Kim Ran Yong, an official concerned of a host organization, said that Pang is the first student who renewed the world records in three memory events alone.
					
					 Pang also won special prizes in reading and mental arithmetic events.
					
					 Pang said that it is her goal to set more new world records.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms DPRK Independent Socialist Fortress against Imperialism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms DPRK Independent Socialist Fortress against Imperialism
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday dedicates an article to the 30th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically along the Road of Socialism and Communism under the Unfurled Banner of the Anti-imperialist Struggle".
					 The work, published on Sept. 25, Juche 76 (1987), elucidates the true colors of modern imperialism and the inevitability of its doom and the advantages of socialism and its invincibility with the profound idea and indisputable logic.
					
					 The article says:
					
					 Over the last 30 years after the work was published the DPRK has clearly proved through its historic struggle that socialism and justice exist on the earth and their might is more powerful than the imperialists' high-handed and arbitrary practices and no force can block the current of the times toward independence and socialism against imperialism.
					
					 In this period our country has demonstrated its might to the world as the fortress of socialism and independence against imperialism and the mouthpiece of justice and truth. It has emerged as an invincible socialist power, an entity strong enough to drive imperialism into the abyss of final doom.
					
					 The DPRK is a Juche power dignified with independence, an invincible military power which brings nothing but defeat to the imperialists in reliance upon the most powerful military capability and the impregnable fortress where the red flag of socialism is fluttering high.
					
					 The courageous spirit of the DPRK dealing one blow after another to the imperialists and dominationists with the strong national self-respect and in the firm spirit of independence is greatly encouraging the countries and peoples loving justice and truth.
					
					 The DPRK is sure to win a final victory in the anti-imperialist struggle, steering the cause of global independence as the fortress of independence soaring in the East.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Rising Up in Confrontation with U.S. to Win Final Victory
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Rising Up in Confrontation with U.S. to Win Final Victory
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The entire party and army and all the people are called upon to rise up in the confrontation with the U.S. and mercilessly punish the U.S. imperialists to win the final victory, says an editorial of Rodong Sinmun Tuesday.
					 Trump, in his maiden address at the world's largest official diplomatic stage, cried out for destroying the DPRK while denying and insulting its existence. This was a behavior of a mentally deranged man that can hardly be imagined as it was the most ferocious declaration of war against the DPRK, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 The best option is to show off action to the silly old man touting what he pleases, being hard of hearing.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK value their country more than their own lives and are ready to settle accounts with those hurting the dignity and the life of the nation in a do-or-die spirit.
					
					 The Korean people are not such powerless as to restrain themselves even though the U.S. imperialists trample down their country and they are not such disgraceful as to kneel before the U.S. and sell off their dignity in pursuit of financial benefits. It is the strong will of the army and people of the DPRK to wipe out to the last man those who are keen on hurting the dignity and life of the Korean nation by answering the enemies' rifles with artillery pieces and nuclear weapons in kind.
					
					 All the officers and men of the People's Army and the people will have to wipe out the root cause of evil and realize the cherished desire of the nation at a stroke once the respected Supreme Commander issues an order.

articles.title: U.S. "Military Counteraction" Will Lead It to Final Ruin
articles.content:
U.S. "Military Counteraction" Will Lead It to Final Ruin
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. "military counteraction" to the DPRK will lead Washington to the final ruin, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary.
					 Citing facts to prove that the U.S. imperialist warmongers are bluffing, being buoyed by war fever, after proposing "military counteraction" against the DPRK again, the commentary goes on:
					
					 Those of the Trump group are vying with each other to call for sort of "military counteraction" against the DPRK. This proves that the U.S. imperialist aggressor warmongers opted for a military adventure by attempting at the provocation of a nuclear war against the DPRK despite strong protest and denunciation of the public at home and abroad.
					
					 The U.S. has zealously persisted in sanctions and military pressure on the DPRK under the pretext of the nuclear issue but it coul never check Songun Korea from dynamically advancing toward the goal of rounding off the state nuclear force under the great banner of simultaneous development of military and economy.
					
					 But the warmongers including the old war maniac of the U.S. are kicking up frenzy while calling for "military counteraction" and failing to come to their senses. This is a foolish an act as trying to break the faith and will of its army and people through intensified military threats and pressure on the DPRK and then provoke a nuclear war against it.
					
					 The U.S. is far across the Pacific but it is by no means a safe place and any military option against the DPRK will bring the final ruin to the U.S., stresses the commentary.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmu Slams Trump as Political Rogue and Gangster
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmu Slams Trump as Political Rogue and Gangster
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Trump spit such remarks as "totally destroying", wild words that had not been heard from any successive U.S. president.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary slams his utterance at the UN arena as the last-ditch efforts of a maniac, taken aback by the invincible spirit of socialist Korea making long strides day by day.
					
					 World media term the hysteric assertion of Trump, who is incompetent in putting into control the things that happened on his land, the most bellicose threat that the international community has not heard so far and the mentally deranged ill-advised bravery of boss of gangsters rather than politician, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Trump brought to light his dirty colors as a political rogue and gangster before the international community.
					
					 The U.S. is the strangler wrecking global peace and security and cancer-like entity.
					
					 Trump without senses is so ignorant of the DPRK, an invincible politico-ideological power whose army and people are rallied as one in mind around their leader, and a world-level military power possessed of inter-continental ballistic missiles and H-bombs.
					
					  Our revolutionary armed forces' strategic nuclear strike means of various kinds are waiting for the order of final attack, having the mainland U.S. and its military bases in the Pacific operational theater within their firing range.
					
					 The world will clearly see how the DPRK will tame Trump and war servants seeking to do harm to it while crying out for a war.

articles.title: Trump Should Have Understanding of DPRK: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Trump Should Have Understanding of DPRK: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- There is a flurry of criticism on the Trump group within the U.S. as regards the fact that the DPRK nearly reached the stage of completing the state nuclear force despite the harsh sanctions and pressure of the hostile forces, says Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 Trump, who only knows the trick of trade, should have a good grasp of his rival before countering the DPRK.
					
					 His group claimed that sanctions and pressure are needed to check the DPRK's nuclear and missile program, but it brought results contrary to expectation.
					
					 The U.S. strategy for toughest sanctions and pressure compelled the DPRK to have a justification for bolstering up the nuclear force and speed up the bolstering of nuclear deterrent for self-defense.
					
					 In the long run, the U.S. is plunging into the deep-precipice of destruction due to its policy which was adopted without knowing its rival, but the DPRK is advancing toward the final victory faster.
					
					 The DPRK will dynamically advance along the road of implementing the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts and clearly show to hostile forces how it attains the goal of completing the state nuclear force.
					
					 The U.S. should give up its futile confrontation racket with the DPRK, mindful that it is quite impossible to check or stop its advance close to its victory.

articles.title: UNSC Must Check High-handed Practices of Specified Countries: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
UNSC Must Check High-handed Practices of Specified Countries: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- It is essential to check the UN Security Council from being misused as a tool for high-handed and arbitrary practices of specified states, and the democracy of the UN with an emphasis on its reform has to be realized at an early date as demanded by the international community, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 The specified UN Security Council permanent member's high-handed and arbitrary practices against sovereign states have been openly carried out in the form of sanctions, blockade, military threats and armed intervention, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The military exercises conducted by the permanent member nation are overlooked even though they threaten peace and security, and measures for self-defence which a UN member nation was forced to take to cope with those exercises have been taken issue. Such abnormal and unequal acts are going on in the world.
					
					 UN has been reduced into a theatre where specified countries' arbitrary acts have been connived so that it is hard to judge which one is above, the UN Charter or the will of the UNSC permanent member nations.
					
					 It is tragedy that the UNSC with international peace and security as its basic mission is being played into the hands of an individual specified country.
					
					 The DPRK will never tolerate the fact that legality and illegality are judged and justice and truth are wantonly violated according to the will of the U.S. and other specified countries.
					
					 No matter what others may say, the DPRK will fulfill its responsibility and duty as a UN member nation for peace of the Korean peninsula and Northeast Asia and furthermore, the peace of the world under the banner of independence.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns Japan Not to Beg for Cooperation in Putting Pressure on DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns Japan Not to Beg for Cooperation in Putting Pressure on DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are going reckless on the DPRK's steps for bolstering up nuclear force. High-ranking politicians including Foreign Minister Kono, Defense Minister Onodera and Prime Minister Abe went to different countries begging for cooperation in putting pressure on the DPRK.
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says:
					
					 Japan, a political dwarf which is little short of a vassal state of the U.S., is styling itself as a giant while talking about "pressure" upon someone at the UN arena.
					
					 At a time when an old lunatic Trump spit out such unprecedented hysteric remarks as "totally destroying" the DPRK, the right-wing politicians of Japan chimed in asserting about "pressure" and "change of policy", failing to realize what consequences they would meet.
					
					 The Japanese politicians more sensible in finding a way out than others dance to the tune of assertion of Trump, a political under-wit, spoiling the future of island country.
					
					 The DPRK is possessed of everything at present. However, Japan is making desperate efforts to prevent its leaping advance of Juche Korea. This is as foolish an act as trying to stop the rotation of the earth with fire hook.
					
					 Japan, which committed the immeasurable, unethical crimes against the Korean nation, is not in a position to have such daydream.
					
					 Our army and people are intending to settle accounts with Japan that adds to the past crimes.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should clearly see the strong will of the Korean people determined to settle accounts with Japan.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Confrontational Colors of S. Korean Authorities
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Confrontational Colors of S. Korean Authorities
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article condemns the south Korean authorities for taking more undisguised confrontational attitude towards the north after discarding the veil of "dialogue".
					 The confrontation maniacs can never hide their true colors, the article says, adding:
					
					 Their "policy towards the north" calling for "simultaneously pushing ahead dialogue and pressure" under the pretext of "settling the north's nuclear issue" is an unpardonable confrontational policy, the keynote of which is nothing but sanctions and pressure on the DPRK.
					
					 What matters is that the puppet forces talk such nonsense that they "remains unchanged" in its policy the keynote of which calls for "settling the problem through dialogue" while running amuck to do harm to the DPRK through unprecedented sanctions and pressure with the backing of the U.S. and other foreign forces.
					
					 Their talk about "dialogue" is an artifice intended to shift the responsibility for failing to start the north-south dialogue onto the north, diverse elsewhere the public criticism by covering up their true colors as traitors worsening the bedeviled north-south relations and justify their anti-reunification "policy towards the north".
					
					 The puppet forces asserted that the "most serious challenge is the north's nukes" and that they would employ all means such as sanctions and pressure to "settle the north's nuclear issue", going all the more reckless in the moves to stifle the DPRK in collusion with the foreign forces.
					
					 This is nothing but the height of provocation and insult to the north.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are talking about "dialogue" while getting frantic with unprecedented sanctions and pressure on the DPRK in collusion with foreign forces under the pretext of the DPRK just measures for bolstering up its nuclear deterrent for self-defense. This is no more than red herring.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Should Clearly Know about Their Condition: Minju Joson
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Should Clearly Know about Their Condition: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet warmongers launched Hyonmu ground-to-ground missile, crying out for "punishment" on someone, which fell into the sea in a few seconds.
					 Commenting on the fact, Minju Joson Tuesday slams this as ridiculous hysteria to counter the DPRK's steady steps for bolstering up nuclear force and its might with trifle weapons.
					
					 They failed to succeed in launching missile with hundreds of kilometers range, though they cried out for "punishment" and "preemptive strike". This deserves a mere child's ridicule.
					
					 Frankly speaking, such puppet forces are not in our consideration. It is easy for the DPRK, ready to turn into ashes the U.S. mainland across the ocean, to wipe out the puppet forces under the very nose of the DPRK at a stroke if they dare to provoke it.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the south Korean puppet warmongers join the U.S. trying to provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK and bring the horrible nuclear disaster to the Korean nation. They are ignorant war maniacs committing suicidal act.
					
					 We warn once again that the puppet forces should be aware of their own conditions and should be mindful that the whole of south Korea will be turned into a barren land in a moment if they dare to provoke.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Call for Cleaning up Deep-rooted Evils and Realizing Social Reform
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Call for Cleaning up Deep-rooted Evils and Realizing Social Reform
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of Struggle for Paek Nam Gi, the Federation of Peasants Associations, the Confederation of Trade Unions and other civic and social organizations in south Korea reportedly held rallies in Seoul on Sept. 23, the first death anniversary of Paek who was killed due to the violent repression of the fascist regime.
					 They called for the eradication of deep-seated evils and the social reform.
					
					 Recalling that Paek struggled against the rice market opening, speakers at the rallies declared that they would resume the candlelight action if the regime refuses to reform the agricultural policy.

articles.title: Shower of Nuclear Bombs Is Good for Trump's Madness: Koreans in China
articles.content:
Shower of Nuclear Bombs Is Good for Trump's Madness: Koreans in China
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Spokespersons for bodies of Korean residents in China on Sept. 22 issued statements supporting the statement of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un which denounced the U.S. chief executive for talking such nonsense as "totally destroying" the DPRK at the UN General Assembly.
					A spokesman for the Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China in his statement said that Kim Jong Un is demonstrating to the world the might of the nuclear power of Juche, Songun Korea, through his decisive and weighty statement - a warning about the doom of the U.S., the evil cesspool.
					
					A spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China said in a statement that the statement of the chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK is a stern sentence to Trump who dared to cry out for "totally destroying" the dignified DPRK. Shower of nuclear fire is best prescription for mad Trump, it stressed.
					
					A spokesman for the Federation of Korean Economic Workers in China said that the old lunatic of America should definitely be tamed with club of fire.

articles.title: Austrian Committee of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Formed
articles.content:
Austrian Committee of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Formed
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- An Austrian committee of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation was formed on September 19.
					 Oliver Jonischkeit, chairman of the Solidarity Committee of Unionists for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Austria, was elected chairman of the above-said committee.

articles.title: DPRK's Founding Anniversary Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Founding Anniversary Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Meetings, receptions, book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Nepal, Laos, Malaysia, Mongolia, Myanmar, Bangladesh, Cambodia, Thailand, Pakistan, Iran, Indonesia, India, Vietnam, Guinea, Nigeria, South Africa, Libya, DR Congo, Equatorial Guinea, Algeria, Uganda and Egypt between September 5 and 9 to celebrate the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos showing the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also works of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu and books and photos introducing the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 Such Korean films as "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" and "Prosperous Pyongyang" were shown.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and pictures depicting them and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Noting that Kim Il Sung founded the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, the Nepalese parliamentary speaker hoped that the Korean people would continue to work miracles, innovations, changes and development in all the fields under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The defense minister of Laos who is member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Lao People's Revolutionary Party said that the DPRK would surely win the final victory as it has the single-minded unity of all the servicepersons and civilians around the party and the leader and the tremendous military strength.
					
					 The state minister for the Foreign Ministry of Uganda hoped that the Korean people would as ever make dynamic advance by dint of self-reliance and self-development.

articles.title: Educational System of DPRK Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Educational System of DPRK Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Internet media of Venezuela and Russia posted articles praising the DPRK's educational system on September 6 and 7 to mark the 40th anniversary of the publication of President Kim Il Sung's work "Theses on Socialist Education".
					 Venezuela's online paper Vida Y Arte said:
					
					 The universal 12-year compulsory education is enforced in the DPRK.
					
					 The first character of its compulsory education is that it is based on free education as the state takes charge of finance for education. This is by no means to say that the DPRK is richer than other countries.
					
					 Profound and noble views on posterity and future are thoroughly embodied in the state policy of the DPRK where there are many things hard to understand in capitalist society in which everything is decided by money.
					
					 The second character is that it is aspiring to the highest reasonable education method as required by the times.
					
					 Thanks to the universal 12-year compulsory education system, students in the DPRK fully acquire ever-increasing broad knowledge in line with the rapid development of science and technology and they have full capability of self-activities after graduation.
					
					 Now the DPRK is dynamically advancing toward the eminence of a socialist power, a highly-civilized nation, on the basis of the most popular and advanced educational system.
					
					 The Russian internet homepage Patrioti Moskva praised the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who devoted all their life to the education for rising generations, regarding it as one of the key problems decisive of the country's destiny and the nation's future. It stressed that thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un the Juche education of Korea is steadily making rapid progress.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre base ganadera en zona de Sepho
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre base ganadera en zona de Sepho
Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, averiguo en el terreno el estado de operacion de la base ganadera en la zona de Sepho.
					  En la granja vacuna Aeguk, la ovejuna y la lechera, la fabrica de procesamiento de carne y otros lugares, el premier estimulo a los funcionarios y trabajadores quienes hacen ingentes esfuerzos por suministrar al pueblo muchas carnes y leches procesadas.
					
					  Estudiando en el terreno la marcha de la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica Kunmin de Sepho y de la Central Hidroelectrica Kunmin de Phyonggang, subrayo que los miembros y los oficiales de la brigada de construccion, dignos de creadores del espiritu de la provincia de Kangwon, deben avivar furiosamente las llamaradas de la creacion de la velocidad de Mallima en la construccion.
					
					   En la reunion de consulta convocada en el terreno, se discutieron los problemas de medidas para gestionar mas efectivamente las bases ganaderas en la zona de Sepho y acelerar mas la construccion de las centrales.

articles.title: RPDC hara todo lo posible para la unidad de G-77, apunta Ri Yong Ho
articles.content:
RPDC hara todo lo posible para la unidad de G-77, apunta Ri Yong Ho
Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El canciller Ri Yong Ho, quien preside la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, pronuncio el dia 22 un discurso en la reunion ministerial del G-77 efectuada en la sede de la ONU. 
					El orador dijo que la Agenda de Desarrollo Sostenible para 2030, adoptada en la Cumbre celebrada en ocasion del 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la ONU, es el programa de accion comun de la humanidad que se compromete a eliminar la desigualdad social y la penuria en escala mundial y construir el mundo que garantice una vida opulenta a nuestra generacion y a las venideras. 
					
					La RPDC reconoce que las metas presentadas en la Agenda de Desarrollo Sostenible convienen a su politica por la construccion de una potencia socialista y se suma activamente a los esfuerzos internacionales para alcanzarlas, destaco y continuo:
					
					Necesita el ambiente pacifico la RPDC que presenta como su meta final la construccion de potencia socialista, ideal y sueno del pueblo.
					
					Pero, lamentablemente, en la arena internacional, un pais especifico, que pretende mantener a toda costa su declinante posicion de "superpotencia", esta cometiendo de continuo las acciones ilegales e inhumanas para arrebatar no solo el derecho al desarrollo sino tambien el derecho a la subsistencia de un Estado soberano. 
					
					Insatisfecho con la amenaza y chantaje militares, EE.UU. trata de imponer el bloqueo economico sobre la RPDC para sofocar su economia en conjunto, insistiendo en la "mas fuerte contramedida internacional".
					
					EE.UU. pide y obliga a otros paises la implementacion de las "resoluciones de sancion" anti-RPDC adoptadas por el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					?Entonces, cual es el fundamento legal de estas "resoluciones de sancion"?
					
					Un pais miembro de la ONU debe verificar claramente la legalidad de las "resoluciones de sancion" anti-RPDC, antes de empenarse por su implementacion. 
					
					Las "resoluciones de sancion" anti-RPDC, fabricadas por EE.UU. con la ayuda del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, son muestras de la pauta de doble rasero y productos de la politica hostil anti-RPDC y la estrategia de dominio al mundo de EE.UU. que trata de dominar toda la Peninsula Coreana y tomar la hegemonia mundial. 
					
					Ateniendose a esta base legal de la ley internacional, la RPDC no reconoce nunca las "resoluciones de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU rechazandolas totalmente como documentos ilegales. 
					
					Mientras que EE.UU. persiste en el despotismo, las arbitrariedades, la intervencion en los asuntos internos y los actos de agresion, despreciando y hostilizando el sistema politico de otros paises abogando por sus pautas y concepciones unilaterales, no se realizaran nunca las metas de desarrollo sostenible presentadas por la sociedad internacional para el fomento del bienestar de la humanidad. 
					
					En el futuro tambien el gobierno de la RPDC cumplira con toda su responsabilidad asegurando la unidad del G-77 para establecer un nuevo orden internacional basado en la justicia, igualdad e imparcialidad fortaleciendo la firme solidaridad con todos los paises que defienden la independencia y sosteniendo en alto la bandera de la independencia antiimperialista.

articles.title: Reunion ministerial del G-77 adopta declaracion contra la sancion anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Reunion ministerial del G-77 adopta declaracion contra la sancion anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 22 en la sede de la ONU la reunion ministerial del G-77 con la participacion de los ministros de Relaciones Exteriores y los delegados de los paises miembros.
					El canciller coreano Ri Yong Ho, quien preside la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, pronuncio un discurso. 
					
					La reunion adopto una declaracion que rechaza la unilateral sancion anti-RPDC reflejando la unanime posicion de principios de los paises miembros del G-77.
					
					La nota reitera el rechazo a la unilateral sancion economica que afecta el desarrollo y la prosperidad de la RPDC y en este sentido, demanda la cancelacion inmediata de las medidas de sancion.

articles.title: CC del PTC felicita el XI Congreso del FRELIMO
articles.content:
CC del PTC felicita el XI Congreso del FRELIMO
Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio el dia 26 un mensaje de felicitacion al XI Congreso del Partido Frente de Liberacion Nacional de Mozambique.
					La misiva senalo que durante mas de 50 anos despues de su fundacion, el FRELIMO logro la independencia del pais mediante la enconada lucha armada y alcanzo muchos exitos en las labores para defender la soberania de la nacion y conseguir la estabilidad politica y el desarrollo socioeconomico del pais.
					
					Y expuso una conviccion de que el Congreso servira de importante oportunidad para consolidar mas los exitos obtenidos en la lucha por el desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad del pais y fortalecer y desarrollar mas la agrupacion politica.
					
					Expresando confianza en que en el futuro tambien se desarrollaran favorablemente conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de dos paises las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos, enlazadas en la lucha comun por la independencia antiimperialista, el mensaje formulo votos sinceros por mayores exitos en los trabajos del Congreso.

articles.title: CC del Partido Chondoista Chong-U condena al viejo loco Trump
articles.content:
CC del Partido Chondoista Chong-U condena al viejo loco Trump
Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En su declaracion publicada el dia 25, el Comite Central del Partido Chondoista Chong-U subrayo que la historica declaracion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, publicada en relacion con el disparate del mandatario estadounidense pronunciado en la Asamblea General de la ONU, es la severa sentencia de la caida final de EE.UU., imperio del mal, y su caudillo Trump.
					Igualmente, constituye la declaracion de justicia mas noble y patriotica que parte de la voluntad de defender firmemente el destino de la patria y el pueblo y el futuro eterno de la nacion coreana.
					
					 La historia registra a los dementes que se divertian con oprimir y agredir a otras naciones. Pero, ningun gangster fue tan antietico e imprudente como Trump quien expuso abiertamente en el oficial escenario internacional su intencion de exterminar un pais, un Estado y una nacion, condeno el documento y prosiguio:
					
					 Se hace cada dia mas fuerte el revanchismo de todos los militares y habitantes coreanos decididos a aniquilar a los enemigos vibrando de indignacion por el chisme de Trump que revelo sin tapujos su intento de hacer sufrir al pueblo coreano los desastres de guerra nuclear ofendiendo atrevidamente la dignidad de la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					  No se puede aguantar ante las bestias que tratan de destruir a la RPDC, paraiso que significa nuestra vida que no podemos cambiar por nada ni perder nunca.
					
					  Los chondoistas, quienes desde la fundacion de su religion, vinieron continuando la tradicion de amor a la patria y a la nacion bajo la bandera de "rechazamiento a la invasion de los europeos y los japoneses" y "proteccion del pais y la tranquilidad del pueblo", se levantaran junto con todos los militares y habitantes en la lucha general antiyanqui por hacer pagar sin falta y mil veces mas caro a Trump su chismografia que insulto de la peor manera a nuestra nacion negando a nuestro Estado sagrado.
					
					  Ese viejo loco no podra eludir el castigo divino.
